de: Right on the edge of the Dolce Via, come and enjoy an artisanal ice cream and a drink at the bar. Why not try a good meal in the restaurant where you can enjoy sweet and savoury snacks, ravioli gratins, small salads and pizzas made on the spot with fresh and organic products.
ru: Right on the edge of the Dolce Via, come and enjoy an artisanal ice cream and a drink at the bar. Why not try a good meal in the restaurant where you can enjoy sweet and savoury snacks, ravioli gratins, small salads and pizzas made on the spot with fresh and organic products.
en: Right on the edge of the Dolce Via, come and enjoy an artisanal ice cream and a drink at the bar. Why not try a good meal in the restaurant where you can enjoy sweet and savoury snacks, ravioli gratins, small salads and pizzas.
it: Right on the edge of the Dolce Via, come and enjoy an artisanal ice cream and a drink at the bar. Why not try a good meal in the restaurant where you can enjoy sweet and savoury snacks, ravioli gratins, small salads and pizzas made on the spot with fresh and organic products.
fr: En bordure directe de la Dolce Via, venez déguster une glace artisanale et prendre un verre au bar. Pourquoi pas encore un bon plat au restaurant où sont proposés des encas salés ou sucrés, gratins de ravioles, petites salades et des pizzas.
zh: Right on the edge of the Dolce Via, come and enjoy an artisanal ice cream and a drink at the bar. Why not try a good meal in the restaurant where you can enjoy sweet and savoury snacks, ravioli gratins, small salads and pizzas made on the spot with fresh and organic products.
es: Right on the edge of the Dolce Via, come and enjoy an artisanal ice cream and a drink at the bar. Why not try a good meal in the restaurant where you can enjoy sweet and savoury snacks, ravioli gratins, small salads and pizzas made on the spot with fresh and organic products.
nl: Kom aan de rand van de Dolce Via genieten van een huisgemaakt ijsje en een drankje aan de bar. Waarom probeert u niet eens een goede maaltijd in het restaurant, waar u kunt genieten van zoete en hartige hapjes, ravioli gratins, kleine salades en pizza's die ter plekke worden gemaakt.

hasBeenCreatedBy.schema:legalName: Office de Tourisme du Pays de Lamastre
